meanings.definition: The state of being controlled by a spirit or supernatural force.
meanings.sent1: Her possessednesses by the ghost made her act strangely.
meanings.sent2: The possessednesses of the haunted house gave everyone chills.
meanings.sent3: The possessednesses of the spooky movie made her jump in her seat.
meanings.sent4: The possessednesses of the old mansion seemed to seep into every corner.
meanings.sent5: The possessednesses of the forest at night felt eerie and unsettling.

meanings.definition: The quality of owning or having possession of something.
meanings.sent1: His possessednesses of the rare coin collection was well-known.
meanings.sent2: The possessednesses of the key to the treasure chest was crucial.
meanings.sent3: Her possessednesses of the last piece of cake caused envy among her friends.
meanings.sent4: The possessednesses of the crown symbolized his royal status.
meanings.sent5: The possessednesses of the family heirloom brought comfort and nostalgia.
